description:
Time for a new chain? This reliable option from KMC will get your 10-speed steed back on the trails, roads or bike lanes in no time.

  • Compatible with SRAM, Shimano and Campagnolo 10-speed drivetrains
  • Includes a reusable KMC Missing Link 10 for easy installation and removal
  • Pins have reinforced axles for improved durability
  • Inner and outer chamfering for smoother shifting in 1x drivetrains
  • Width: 5.88mm
name: KMC X10 GY/GY 10 Speed Chain
